name: you're not a rogue
description:
You're not a rogue, and your rogue isn't here. Still gotta open that door!

Made for the bitsy classic jam, though not made in bitsy classic. I still tried to keep the game as simple as possible: no hacks, only 3 colors and 1 room. I tried to encapsulate what is "classic" to me, featuring (mostly) only the things I was able to do with the bitsy I know from when I started using it.

Use arrow keys or WASD to move around. Bump into things to interact with them.
